name: SubmitTimeReviewEvent
description:
Submit a time review event for a worker.

Use this tool to create a time review event for a specific worker. Ideal for managers or administrators to submit time on behalf of employees, or for employees to submit their own time for approval. Ensure to specify the date for the time review period. Optionally, include a comment if it's allowed by the business process.

parameters.name: workday_worker_id
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the worker for whom the time review event is being created.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: time_review_event_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'date' (required) and 'comment' (optional) for submitting a time review event. 'date' should follow the format YYYY-MM-DD. Include a 'comment' only if it is permitted by the business process.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
